abstract: Cuban-themed bar BlackTail will soon open in Downtown Manhattan, decorated to suggest American bar in Havana and initially offering 40-drink cocktail list that is expected to expand; bar team will make classic Cuban rum drinks from special blend they concocted to fill in for lack of authentic Cuban rum.
lead_paragraph: A new downtown bar and restaurant from the Dead Rabbit team summons the Havana frequented by Hemingway and Capone.

headline.main: A Sip of Prohibition-Era Cuba at BlackTail
headline.print_headline: A Diplomatic Thaw (but Not in the Ice Cubes)

snippet: A new downtown bar and restaurant from the Dead Rabbit team summons the Havana frequented by Hemingway and Capone....
